## Burgers, Tacos, Kebabs and Hotdogs
Unlike most food, burgers, tacos, kebabs and hotdogs can be filled with a wide variety of items. Experiment and find out what you can make!
- To start a burger tower, slice a bun in two and place ingredients on the bottom bun. To finish the burger, place the top bun as the final ingredient. - To create a taco, use your ingredients on a taco shell. - To create a kebab, use your ingredients on a metal skewer. - To create a hotdog, place your ingredients in a hotdog bun.
